observation.output:
Testing HPacker alignment fix...
Input: hd_list = [(20, 0), (30, 0)], container_height = 30

User requested alignment: 'top'
Mapped to internal alignment: 'bottom'
  Returned offsets: [10, 0]
  Element 0 (h=20): bottom at y=10, top at y=30
  Element 1 (h=30): bottom at y=0, top at y=30
  Expected: Both elements should have tops aligned
  Result: ✓ CORRECT - tops aligned

User requested alignment: 'bottom'
Mapped to internal alignment: 'top'
  Returned offsets: [0, 0]
  Element 0 (h=20): bottom at y=0, top at y=20
  Element 1 (h=30): bottom at y=0, top at y=30
  Expected: Both elements should have bottoms aligned
  Result: ✓ CORRECT - bottoms aligned

Testing VPacker alignment (should be unchanged)...
Input: wd_list = [(20, 0), (30, 0)], container_width = 30

VPacker alignment: 'left'
  Returned offsets: [0, 0]
  Element 0 (w=20): left at x=0, right at x=20
  Element 1 (w=30): left at x=0, right at x=30
  Expected: Both elements should have lefts aligned
  Result: ✓ CORRECT - lefts aligned

VPacker alignment: 'right'
  Returned offsets: [10, 0]
  Element 0 (w=20): left at x=10, right at x=30
  Element 1 (w=30): left at x=0, right at x=30
  Expected: Both elements should have rights aligned
  Result: ✓ CORRECT - rights aligned

=== COMPARISON: BEFORE vs AFTER FIX ===

User wants: align='top'
  BEFORE FIX: offsets = [0, 0]
  AFTER FIX:  offsets = [10, 0]
  BEFORE FIX: tops at [20, 30] -> NOT aligned
  AFTER FIX:  tops at [30, 30] -> aligned

User wants: align='bottom'
  BEFORE FIX: offsets = [10, 0]
  AFTER FIX:  offsets = [0, 0]
  BEFORE FIX: bottoms at [10, 0] -> NOT aligned
  AFTER FIX:  bottoms at [0, 0] -> aligned
